properties.displayName: UAC Bypass Using IDiagnostic Profile - File
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\DllHost.exe" and FolderPath endswith ".dll" and FolderPath startswith "C:\\Windows\\System32\\"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the creation of a file by "dllhost.exe" in System32 directory part of "IDiagnosticProfileUAC" UAC bypass technique
